Description.Text: Facilities Travellers can feel at home in one of the 6 rooms. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas. Rooms Each of the rooms is appointed with air conditioning, a kitchen and a bathroom. The rooms have a double bed or a sofabed. There is also a safe. A fridge and a microwave ensure a comfortable stay. Internet access, a TV and WiFi add to the comfort of the holiday. Amenities in the bathrooms include a shower. The hotel offers non-smoking rooms.

Travellers can feel at home in one of the 6 rooms. Wireless internet access is available to guests in the public areas.
